MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK9 postcode area of Bridge of Allan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.28pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Blackdub substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.48pm on Thursday 18th February 2021.
